name: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade: Bey Battle Tournament
overview: Beyblade is the extreme sports experience where every fan can become an active competitor using strategy to build and customize their battle equipment in pursuit of becoming the World Beyblade Champion. To hardcore Beybladers, their world revolves around Beystadium where they battle for supremacy. Each Beyblade is as unique as its owner, involving the custom assembly of five key parts--the bit chip, attack ring, weight disk, spin gear, and blade base. The only way to see whose "Beyblade" has the ultimate power is to match them up for a battle.
